Package net.conquiris.api.search

Interface Summary
HitMapper<T> Mapper from a search hit to a custom object.
ManagedReaderSupplier Interface for managed index reader suppliers.
ReaderSupplier Interface for index reader suppliers.
Searcher Interface for conquiris searchers.
SearcherService Conquiris Searcher Service.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHitMapper<T> Abstract implementation of a hit mapper.
CountResult Count result.
Highlight Highlight configuration.
Highlight.HighlightedQuery  
ItemResult<T> Result representing a single item.
PageResult<T> Result representing a page of search results.
Reader A reference to an exact instance of an index reader.
Result Base class for search results.
 

Exception Summary
IndexNotAvailableException Exception thrown when there's an error accessing an index during search.
SearchException Base class for search related exceptions.
